title: 1 Pack 20 Gallon Large Storage Bag for Clothes, Zipper Clothing Storage Bag, Clear Organizer with Reinforced Handles, for Comforters Blankets Pillows Bedding
features: Large Storage Bags for Clothes: Our large, flexible clothing storage bags offer a space-saving alternative to bulky bins. Easily stowable under beds or in closets and attics, they're perfect for rooms and living areas, maximizing storage without sacrificing style.

Long-Lasting Quality: Crafted from premium, robust plastic, these odorless clothing storage bags are thicker for enhanced durability. They protect your garments from dust and dirt, maintaining a sturdy structure for reliable long-term use.

Resilient Closure and Handles: Equipped with a sturdy two-way zipper, these storage bags ensure effortless opening and closing, designed to withstand frequent use without damage. Additionally, the two built-in, reinforced handles offer durability for prolonged use, making it easy to transport your stored items.

Transparent and Airy Design: The semi-transparent plastic of these storage bags provides a clear view of the contents, enabling you to easily spot the clothes you've stored away. The breathable mesh fabric along the zipper ensures proper air circulation, contributing to the freshness, thus keeping your stored items clean and well-ventilated for an extended period.

Ample Storage Space: These zippered storage bags boast a generous size of 16”x26”x12” with a 20-gallon capacity, capable of accommodating 30 garments or a single king-size comforter. Ideal for compactly storing comforters, blankets, clothing, pillows, toys, and seasonal decorations, they offer a versatile storage solution for various household items.
description: Product Description See & Store Smarter with Our 20-Gallon Clear Storage Box! See More – Crystal-clear walls for instant visibility Store More – Massive 20-gallon capacity reduces clutter Lasts Longer – Ultra-durable PE plastic outperforms fabric bins Breathes Better – Ventilated design keeps contents fresh Works Harder – Perfect for every room and every lifestyle Massive Capacity – Fit Everything You Need! With 18 uk gallons (about 80 liters) of storage space, our clear bin holds more than standard-sized boxes, so you can: ✔ Store bulky seasonal items – winter coats, comforters, holiday decorations – without squishing or overstuffing. ✔ Consolidate multiple small bins – Replace 3-4 smaller containers with one spacious box, saving floor and closet space. ✔ Perfect for bulkier items – sleeping bags, sports gear, large toys, or even a full set of spare bedding. Why Us? Crystal-Clear Visibility – Never Lose Track Again! Tired of digging through opaque bins? Our 20-gallon transparent storage box lets you instantly identify contents—whether it’s holiday decorations, kids’ toys, work files, or seasonal clothing. No more wasted time searching! Ultra-Durable PE Plastic – Built to Last! Unlike flimsy fabric or low-quality plastic bins, our storage box is made of high-strength PE plastic that: ✔ Won’t tear, fray, or absorb moisture (unlike fabric bins) ✔ Resists cracks, dents, and scratches (perfect for heavy items!) ✔ Easy to wipe clean—no stains or odors stick around Smart Ventilation Design – No More Musty Smells! Special ventilated zipper design prevents musty odors and dampness, ideal for sensitive items like photo albums or woolens. Perfect for Any Space & Lifestyle: Home Organization – Store blankets, pillows, winter coats, or shoes neatly under the bed or in closets. Kids’ Rooms – Keep toys, books, and art supplies visible yet tidy. (Great for Montessori-style organization!) Garage & Workshop – Heavy-duty enough for tools, car accessories, or gardening supplies. Office & Dorm Rooms – Ideal for documents, stationery, or snack stashes. Travel & Camping – Pack gear, tents, or extra clothes securely with the breathable zipper preventing water. Stackable & Space-Saving Even with its huge capacity, the slim design allows neat stacking, so you maximize vertical storage without clutter. Ideal For: • Busy Parents – Keep kids’ clutter under control while making cleanup easy. • Minimalists – Store items out of sight but still accessible. • Students & Renters – Portable, sleek, and great for small spaces. • DIYers & Organizing Enthusiasts – Label-free convenience with full visibility!
